comments.body: So when pasting this in my browser it redirects to the URL prior to this commit - is there any reason for changing this?

At the bottom of the page it says:

>Please use the canonical form https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=Radviz to link to this page.

It's a little strange that it redirects back to the original URL but seems to be CRAN's preference to use those links.
Hmm that's weird. Makes sense for this PR then!

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1027,1031 @@our sample will be drawn. Depending on which class that sample belongs it will
be colored differently.
See the R package `Radviz <https://cran.r-project.org/package=Radviz/>`__
for more information.
